item.title: NixOS on Raspberry Pi: The Good, the Bad and "the Linux way"
item.description: Gran Torino (Film) Â© 2008 Warner Bros. Pictures Disclaimer: this is not a tutorial, but a story of me trying the new hype thing that I am probably too old for ðŸ˜€ I have a confession to start this article with: I have never enjoyed “the Linux way” of doing things: “Everything at once” package updates via distributives Having a strong allergy to binaries Piping like a 19 y.
